snippet: The new collective bargaining agreement between the union and Major League Baseball allows teams and players to appeal calls by official scorers.
abstract: Box Seats; new collective bargaining agreement between the union and Major League Baseball allows teams and players to appeal the calls by official scorers.
lead_paragraph: The new collective bargaining agreement between the union and Major League Baseball allows teams and players to appeal calls by official scorers.

headline.seo: A Baseball Official Scorer’s Call Isn’t Always Last Word
headline.main: An Official Scorer’s Call Isn’t Always the Last Word
headline.print_headline: An Official Scorer’s Call Isn’t Always the Last Word
